info.title: NewsGraph API
info.description: Make sample calls to the NewsGraph API using I/O Docs. For more information, refer to our full documentation.

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: NewsGraph Search allows you to find content by pro...
get.description:
NewsGraph Search allows you to find content by providing matching criteria. 
Full documentation for Search

parameters.name: query-key
parameters.description: The field you would like to search. Learn More

parameters.name: query-value
parameters.description: The value for the key you are searching with. Separate multiple values with a semicolon. Learn more

parameters.name: additional-query-parameters
parameters.description: Additional query key-value pairs can also be added if desired by using a / to separate each pair. Learn more.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: The amount of items to be returned. Learn more.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The row at which the results should begin. Learn more.

parameters.name: sort-option
parameters.description: Apply a specific sort order to the returned content. Learn more.

get.summary: The Card Factory turns section landing pages into ...
get.description:
The Card Factory turns section landing pages into clean feeds of content cards.
Full documentation for Card Factory - Sections

parameters.name: data-source
parameters.description: The data source for the requested section. Values are 'cnn' or 'money'.

parameters.name: section-name
parameters.description: The name value of the requested section. Contact us for a list of sections.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: The amount of items to be returned.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The row at which the results should begin.

get.summary: The Card Factory turns show landing pages into cle...
get.description:
The Card Factory turns show landing pages into clean feeds of content cards.
Full documentation for Card Factory - Shows

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The NewsGraph ID of the show being requested.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: The amount of items to be returned.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The row at which the results should begin.

get.description:

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The NewsGraph ID of the special being requested.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: The amount of items to be returned.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The row at which the results should begin.

get.description:
The Card Factory turns video collections into clean feeds of content cards.

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: start

get.summary: Request a batch of up to 20 documents using their ...
get.description:
Request a batch of up to 20 documents using their ID value.
Full documentation for Docs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The NewsGraph ID of the content to be returned.

parameters.name: additional-ids
parameters.description: Use a semicolon to separate multiple id values
